name: Competitive not ShopLifting
description:
Game made during a Jam in 2019 in EGX! Made by students from S.A.E. London

Controls:

Player 1:

      W-A-S-D - Move

      C  - Dash

     V  -  Interact

     B - Spawn item

Player 2:

     Arrows  -  Move

     J - Dash

     K - Interact

     l - Spawn item

Credits:

Pedro Rainha - Programmer

Joao Rainha - Programmer

Freddie Hodge - Programmer

Tachan Harries - Environment Artist

Ola Bada - Character Artist

Wojciech Pawel - Environment Artist / Level Designer
